commandList:
!addrole - Specify one or multiple keywords to be assigned to the respective role/s.
!deleterole - Specify one or multiple keywords to be removed from the respective role/s.
!roles - list of all the roles available
!courseinfo - Enter the department/subject code/course number to retrieve a list of courses offered in Fall 2018 as an image.
!weather - Provides the weather of the city specified
